title: Here foloweth the. C. hystoryes of Troye Lepistre de Othea deesse de Prudence, enuoyee a lesperit cheualereny [sic] Hector de Troye, auec cent histoires.
author: Christine, de Pisan, ca. 1364-ca. 1431.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprynted be me Robert Wyer, dwellyng in S. Martyns paryshe, at charyng Crosse. at the sygne of s. Ioh[a]n Euangelist besyde the Duke of Suffolkes place,
